attributes.action: Express disapproval of the planned execution of Mohamed al-Nimr of Saudi Arabi?
attributes.background:
Mohamed al Nimr has been sentenced to death over his role in anti-government protests.  He was 17 at the time of his involvement.

Can the UK Government please express their disapproval of the planned execution of Mohamed al-Nimr of Saudi Arabi?

rejection.details:
We think this petition is similar to yours:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/109215

You might like to sign this petition instead. It is more likely to get more signatures that way.
